description: This file defines the interfaces for PowerManager implementation and API, including abstract classes with virtual functions that manage power states, wakeup sources, deep sleep modes, and related functionalities. It also includes class declarations, external includes, and documentation comments.

classes.name: PowerManagerImpl
classes.description: Abstract class defining the interface for power management implementations, including methods for initializing, setting power states, wakeup sources, deep sleep management, and cleanup.

classes.name: PowerManagerAPI
classes.description: Static API class providing access to power management functionalities through a singleton-like pattern, delegating to an implementation of PowerManagerImpl.

methods.name: PowerManagerImpl::PLAT_INIT
methods.description: Initialize power management hardware or subsystems.

methods.name: PowerManagerImpl::PLAT_API_SetPowerState
methods.description: Set the current power state.

methods.name: PowerManagerImpl::PLAT_API_GetPowerState
methods.description: Retrieve the current power state.

methods.name: PowerManagerImpl::PLAT_API_SetWakeupSrc
methods.description: Configure wakeup source.

methods.name: PowerManagerImpl::PLAT_API_GetWakeupSrc
methods.description: Get the status of a wakeup source.

methods.name: PowerManagerImpl::PLAT_Reset
methods.description: Reset the power management state.

methods.name: PowerManagerImpl::PLAT_TERM
methods.description: Terminate power management and release resources.

methods.name: PowerManagerImpl::PLAT_DS_INIT
methods.description: Initialize deep sleep mode.

methods.name: PowerManagerImpl::PLAT_DS_SetDeepSleep
methods.description: Configure deep sleep parameters.

methods.name: PowerManagerImpl::PLAT_DS_DeepSleepWakeup
methods.description: Wake up from deep sleep.

methods.name: PowerManagerImpl::PLAT_DS_GetLastWakeupReason
methods.description: Get the reason for the last wakeup.

methods.name: PowerManagerImpl::PLAT_DS_GetLastWakeupKeyCode
methods.description: Get the key code responsible for the last wakeup.

methods.name: PowerManagerImpl::PLAT_DS_TERM
methods.description: Terminate deep sleep mode.

methods.name: PowerManagerAPI::setImpl
methods.description: Set the implementation instance for power management.

methods.name: PowerManagerAPI::PLAT_INIT
methods.description: Initialize the power management system.

methods.name: PowerManagerAPI::PLAT_API_SetPowerState
methods.description: Set the power state via API.

methods.name: PowerManagerAPI::PLAT_API_GetPowerState
methods.description: Get the current power state via API.

methods.name: PowerManagerAPI::PLAT_API_SetWakeupSrc
methods.description: Configure wakeup source via API.

methods.name: PowerManagerAPI::PLAT_API_GetWakeupSrc
methods.description: Retrieve wakeup source status via API.

methods.name: PowerManagerAPI::PLAT_Reset
methods.description: Reset power management via API.

methods.name: PowerManagerAPI::PLAT_TERM
methods.description: Terminate power management via API.

methods.name: PowerManagerAPI::PLAT_DS_INIT
methods.description: Initialize deep sleep mode via API.

methods.name: PowerManagerAPI::PLAT_DS_SetDeepSleep
methods.description: Configure deep sleep parameters via API.

methods.name: PowerManagerAPI::PLAT_DS_DeepSleepWakeup
methods.description: Wakeup from deep sleep via API.

methods.name: PowerManagerAPI::PLAT_DS_GetLastWakeupReason
methods.description: Get last wakeup reason via API.

methods.name: PowerManagerAPI::PLAT_DS_GetLastWakeupKeyCode
methods.description: Get last wakeup key code via API.

methods.name: PowerManagerAPI::PLAT_DS_TERM
methods.description: Terminate deep sleep mode via API.
